title: Mike at Wrykyn
description: An alternative cover for this ISBN can be found here. A delightful romp through the early career of Mike, a talented sportsman. The evocation of public school life and the codes of honor belonging to school, family, and the game are conveyed with P.G. Wodehouse's customary wit and brilliance.[Librarian Note: The book Mike contains this book as the first half, and Mike and Psmith as the second half.]
author: P.G. Wodehouse
